text: (he nabee!) aap unhen apane se door na karen, jo apane paalanahaar kee vandana praatah sandhya karate evan usakee prasannata kee chaah mein lage rahate hain. unake haî€¼isaab ka koee bhaar aapapar nahin hai aur na aapake haî€¼isaab ka koee bhaar unapar[1] hai, atah yadi aap unhen door karenge, to atyaachaariyon mein ho jaayenge
